mapper.insert: insert into tbl_student ( st_num, st_name, st_dept, st_grade, st_tel, st_addr ) values ( #{st_num}, #{st_name}, #{st_dept}, #{st_grade}, #{st_tel}, #{st_addr} )
mapper.update: update tbl_student set st_name= #{st_name}, st_dept= #{st_dept}, st_grade= #{st_grade}, st_tel= #{st_tel}, st_addr= #{st_addr} where st_num = #{st_num}
mapper.select: Create Table if not exists tbl_memo ( m_seq BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, m_author VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL, m_date VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, m_time VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, m_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, m_memo VARCHAR(400) NOT NULL, m_image VARCHAR(125), m_up_image VARCHAR(125) )
